Text.Page:
We've discovered one unique item in the area—crystalline noctenium. This may be exactly what I need to break through and unlock the power of noctenium.

You'll have to break off shards from the {@linkcreature:123#501#crystalline noctenium}—and by break off, I mean strike it with all the power your 's weapon can muster.
Excellent. I trust the task wasn't too hard?
My research is imperative for the continuous success of the Iron Order.
